displaytitle: The World's Edge, Remembering Magellan--The Atlantic Ocean, Five Capes, Portugal, Cabo de Sao Vicente
creditline: Museum purchase, bequest of John W. H. Simpson, Class of 1966, in memory of Wellington Hope Simpson, Class of 1931
inscribed:
Inscribed in graphite on mount, recto below lower right corner of image:  Thomas
Inscribed in ink, verso center:  THE WORLD’S EDGE / REMEMBERING MAGELLAN—THE ATLANTIC OCEAN / FIVE CAPES—PORTUGAL / 1994 / CABO DE SÃO VICENTE / (MIDNIGHT) / THE FURTHEST SOUTHWEST POINT OF CONTINENTAL EUROPE / [PART SEVEN OF AN EIGHT PART WORK] / —THE EDGE OF THE RENAISSANCE WORLD— / © Thomas Joshua Cooper A/P unique split set / negative 1994 // print 1994
